name: The Myth of Sisyphus (PR Games)
description:
My first ever solo game jam project :)! Made for Mini Jam 128: Health.

The restriction was "The only way to go is up", which reminded me of Sisyphus, who was punished to push a boulder up a mountain for eternity, always failing, but having no choice but to go back up.  Poor guy :").
